job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Aviture is a technology solutions organization made up of individuals who care about our trade and the impact of our services We strive to make a true difference in our clients lives with the solutions we craft ensuring the newest techniques are used effectively to promote innovation within our own walls and those of our clients Our engineers work on nextgeneration systems across a wide variety of industries including the Department of Defense communications healthcare energy banking retail hospitality logistics and technical RampampDltbrgtltbrgtThe solutions we create haveltbrgtltulgtltligtSaved lives in the California wildfires and southern US floodingltligtltligtProvided security for the Super Bowl and postattack Boston MarathonltligtltligtProvided augmentedreality training environments for surgeonsltligtltligtEnabled major corporations to pivot into IoTltligtltligtIncreased transparency and promoted patient wellness in hospitals and senior care facilitiesltligtltligtProvided risk analysis of stock portfoliosltligtltligtCombined computer vision and robotics to automate dangerous manual labor tasksltligtltligtPreserved life and increased mission success by allowing government leaders to make quick and informed decisionsltbrgtltligtltulgtPart of our secret sauce is our continued exposure to diverse and interesting problems and the ability to share ideas across domains in a manner not typically done within a single industryltbrgtltbrgtAt our core Aviture is a group of engineers seeking to build better solutions We pursue people with aptitude and drive first and foremost which allows us a staff that spans across all levels of experience skillsets and software disciplines Our prime candidates are people who have technology in their DNA and want to pursue the why behind their work We value a healthy worklife balance so we provide flex time and reasonable hours all while pushing ourselves to grow and become faster better engineersltbrgtltbrgtIf this sounds like the kind of environment youd like to be in why dont you drop us a line Wed love to talk to
